author: @sakshinews
title: Maharashtra HSC Admit Card 2025 Released: Download Your Hall Ticket Now | MSBSHSE HSC Admit Card 2025: Check Your Exam Details Here | Maharashtra 12th Admit Card 2025: Download Your Hall Ticket from Official Website | HSC Maharashtra Admit Card 2025: Know How to Download Your Exam Admit Card | Maharashtra HSC Hall Ticket 2025: Essential Information for Students | Download Maharashtra HSC Admit Card 2025: Step-by-Step Guide | Maharashtra HSC Admit Card Download
text:
Maharashtra HSC Hall Ticket 2025 Released: Download at mahahsscboard.in
The Maharashtra State Board of Secondary and Higher Secondary Education (MSBSHSE) published the Maharashtra HSC hall ticket 2025 on January 11, 2025, on the official website, mahahsscboard.in. The admit card is an important document that must be acquired by students to sit for the Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) exams.
Key Highlights
- Admit Card Release Date: January 11, 2025
- Admit Card Availability: Available on the official website, mahahsscboard.in
- Admit Card Download: Admit cards can be downloaded by colleges through their login details
- Hall Pass: Additional hall passes are expected in June 2025
Significance of Admit Card
The Maharashtra HSC admit card 2025 will have important details, such as:
- Name of the student
- Roll number
- Admit card number
- Date of Examination
- Name and address of the examination center
Instructions for Students
The following instructions have to be followed by students:
- Get the admit card from school after the principal signature
- Bring the admit card to the exam center on every exam day
- Follow the general instructions described on the admit card, for example, do not bring electronic devices to the exam center
Download Admit Card
To download the admit card, students and schools can follow these steps:
- Go to the official website: mahahsscboard.in
- Click on the link "Admit Card"
- Choose the appropriate option (Paid Status Admit Card or Extra Seat No Admit Card)
- Enter the requisite information, i.e., registration ID and seat number
- Download and take a print of the admit card
Admit Card Not Present Penalties
No student will be permitted to appear for the exam in the absence of the admit card. Hence, students must get the admit card from school and bring it to the exam center on every exam date.
By adhering to the above instructions and guidelines, students can make sure they have a smooth and trouble-free exam experience.
Also read: FII DII Data: How Institutional Investments Impact the Stock Market

author: Pacman
title: #71 Martin Varsavsky: "Los dueños de @meneame creemos que está mucho más a la izquierda de lo que representa el público español. Pero eso es fácil de arreglar..."
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#2](c2#c-2) No esta contento teniendo a gente de izquierdas trabajando gratis para el... necesita que la gente de centro tambien lo haga!
Y si la gente de la derecha y la ultraderecha le fuera a proporcionar mas dinero, pues bienvenidos serian tambien!
El señor Martin Varsavsky , sera el propietario de Mename, pero la comunidad es dueña de la plataforma.
Sin comunidad, no hay Meneame.
Cuando esta eprsona compro parte de Meneame, yo ya llevaba un tiempo por aqui, por ejemplo.
[#1](c1#c-1) Será idiota, pero está proponiendo la única forma posible para equilibrar ideológicamente Menéame: que usuarios de ideología más de centro o de derechas hagan lo mismo que hacen algunos usuarios de izquierdas: organizarse y votar. Tampoco está diciendo nada extraordinario...
[#27](c27#c-27) Como seguro que no hay debate es si todos pensamos igual o si se sigue abusando del puto ignore.
[#29](c29#c-29) El ignore es uno de los mayores canceres de este sitio, rompe completamente el funcionamiento y permite que algunos comentarios parezca que queden sin respuesta, es una de las cosas que se debería cambiar, si quiere que no lo lea el que lo pone, pero que se pueda responder.
[#27](c27#c-27) Al menos contrarrestarán a los 500 izquierdosos que ahora andamos organizados aquí. Yo no le tengo miedo a los derechosos, ¿tú sí?
[#9](c9#c-9) Es que ningún medio representa la media ideológica, y la culpa la tiene la paradoja de la tolerancia. En el momento en que dejas entrar a todo el mundo y que digan lo que les sale del nabo muchos se piran para no tener que aguantar a los más radicales, y al final te queda todo escorado hacia un lado. Después siempre ocurre lo mismo, que los radicales se cansan de discutir entre ellos e intentan "colonizar" otros servicios en los que la cosa es más sana
Los blogs de webedia son un ejemplo perfecto, y es que después de tantos años de intentar moderar lo mismo posible se les han quedado solo los más locos escribiendo, y los comentarios se han reducido exponencialmente en poquísimo tiempo. ¿Para qué voy a comentar yo sobre un videojuegos, películas o tecnología si ya sé que los que me van a leer solo vienen a contar su libro?
[#9](c9#c-9) Ya hay bastantes medios de derechas.
Tu conoces algunos? Puedes enumerar alguno. Es para un amigo.
[#9](c9#c-9) ¿es estúpido promover la idea de que Menéme debería ser lo más diverso posible? ¿Qué habría de malo?
[#51](c51#c-51) Meneame es muy diverso. Lo que pasa es que aquí no te suelen cuelar un bulo en portada, y claro como la derecha crece a base de bulos, pues parece que meneame es de izquierda, cuando es de intentar contrarestar la plaga de bulos politizados por la derecha, sin hablar de la investigaciones judiciales bajo encargo de la misma derecha.
[#64](c64#c-64) Tu comentario es una prueba de lo sesgado que está MNM. Das por hecho que solo la derecha lanza bulos y aceptas acríticamente que la izquierda es la poseedora de la verdad absoluta y que Menéame es algo así como la reserva moral de occidente.
Vaya, ¿a qué me suena esto? Al final los extremos se tocan.
[#5](c5#c-5) la gente de derechas con pasta pasa esta gastandose el dinero y no en entrando en sitios de probes, los de derechas sin pasta estan ocupados currando como animales persiguiendo la zanahoria.
[#5](c5#c-5) No sé.
Yo observo anomalías por aquí, que por desgracia enrarecen la participación de uno, incluso cuando vas sin estridencias, cautela máxima y hasta argumentos para poder llegar a conclusiones (conclusiones que serán certeras o no, pero al menos argumentadas).
Como por ejemplo en este comentario que hice hoy:
intento-golpe-bolivia-foto-video-presidente-luis-arce-cara-cara/c05#c-5 [#36](c36#c-36) en la práctica, los negativos se utilizan para castigar al que tiene determinadas opiniones, independientemente de cómo las exprese. Esto que dices también se manifiesta de otra forma: se potencian con positivos comentarios absolutamente irrelevantes o que no aportan nada a la discusión, pero que van en una determinada línea ideológica, como por ejemplo el número [#1](c1#c-1) (sin acritud).
[#1](c1#c-1) Tampoco es cuestión de ser más listo o más tonto, es simplemente no entender qué vende tu empresa. Foros y "portales" de derechas hay a patadas, y bastante más grandes que Menéame. Querer tener aquí lo mismo que cualquiera puede encontrar en forocoches o burbuja (o mismamente Twitter) es un tanto absurdo y al final solo consigue que el tráfico caiga en picado porque la gente no quiere sucedáneos si puede quedarse con los originales.
Es decir, interpreto que siendo parte de MnM ¿propone violar las normas de MnM?
¿Es eso o lo he entendido yo mal?
" ...es fácil de arreglar si entran unos 500 votantes que sean de centro o de derecha. Recomiendo a los votantes de estas ideas políticas organizarse y entrar".
Propone que unos 500 usuarios se coordinen y hagan campaña pòlitica / ideologica
Las normas:
https://www.meneame.net/legal#contact
6. El usuario se abstendrá de usar Menéame con el objetivo de...b) las campañas comerciales (aunque el lugar promocionado no contenga publicidad directa), políticas o ideológicos promoviendo el voto masivo a las noticias objeto de la campaña o del lugar promocionado....
Muy biem, Martin.
Bravo
Que alguien le diga a
#_6 q si tanto le gusta la variedad ideologia y le molesta el sectarismo q no bloquee a medio meneame
Joder, es q es ridiculo
[#8](c8#c-8) Un gilipollas.
Le sigo en twitter pq es un gilipollas q me recuerda, a cada tweet, q ser millonario es cuestion de suerte y no de capacidades.
Un crack.
[#31](c31#c-31) Es de esa gente que evidencia la irracionalidad del reparto de riqueza. Gente sin sentido del ridículo, semianalfabeta, progenocida, sectaria e inicua amasando millones
Tampoco es malo per se que haya una mayoría ideológica de un lado del espectro.
Lo cansino es el sectarismo de un grupo de cuentas organizadas, que se dedican a aupar las noticias enviadas por ellos mismos, envían 5 veces la misma noticia con una ligerísima variación, cuando no directamente bulos. Tienen docenas de cuentas, lo cual es muy beneficioso en una web como menéame, que premia la endogamia, porque es la mejor forma de ganar karma
Yo justo estoy en meneame porque no hay una asfixiante jauría de ultraderecha que constantemente insulta y menosprecia
¿Y no será mejor que nos pongamos todos de acuerdo, nos montemos un agregador de noticias y nos larguemos de esta mierda?
Me preguntan por qué estoy tuiteando tanto contra la invasión rusa a ucrania. Explico mi conexión emocional: de mis cuatro abuelos 3 eran ucranianos y judíos como el presidente Zelensky. Esta lucha es por la defensa de los valores europeos contra la tiranía de Putin.
Pues macho, a ver si limpiamos la casa de mierda nazi que meneame es el mayor y quizás único reducto de putinejos de habla hispana.
Nazi = basura inhumana salida del XIX.
Ultrarreligioso = enfermedad aceptable socialmente haciendo que un analfabeto funcional ignore la ciencia más básica siendo adulto. Gente que debería estar lejos de todo mando.
Estalinista = magufo historicista.
Gitanista tribalista AKA manda mi etnia y no el estado payo = mismo imbecilismo que el neonazi, pero con un punto exótico.
Neocon = imbécil en potencia. Ver caso de pueblo de EEUU que prometía ser la arcadia neocon sin pagar impuestos con individualismo a tope. En semanas se les llenó de mierda y de animales salvajes tuviendo que pedir ayuda al gobierno federal.
Martín, si eres uno de esos cuatro, mejor madura.

author: world today news
title: The Las Vegas Expo Showcases Cutting-Edge Artificial Intelligence Technologies
text:
The Las Vegas Expo, one of the most important annual gatherings for
technology enthusiasts, kicks off on Tuesday, with a wide scope for artificial intelligence technologies whose promoters are focusing on their capabilities to make already complex electrical products more “intelligent,” and even more “human.”
Adam Borden, global director of innovation at Accenture, noted that the most important issue at this year’s Consumer Electronics Show is “how to integrate artificial intelligence” into existing technologies. He stressed that “artificial intelligence does not produce superhumans, but rather it will make humans better.”
At the exhibition this year, there are robots that, thanks to artificial intelligence, have become more capable of interacting, smarter cars, and other products that have witnessed great progress based on this
technology.
The exhibition, which will be held from January 9 to 12 in Las Vegas, includes more than 3,500 exhibitors and about 130,000 participants.
Since last year, the exhibition has regained its large public attendance, even though it has suffered, like other major conferences and forums, from the consequences of the Covid pandemic.
Gary Shapiro, president of the Consumer
Technology Association, which organizes the exhibition, confirmed that “the Chinese are coming back.” However, the number of Chinese exhibitors, at 500, is half what it was before Covid-19.
Delegations from major groups such as Amazon, Google, Intel, Samsung, Sony, and TikTok are attending, but the Las Vegas exhibition is, above all, an opportunity for startups to shine and emerge, she explained. Carolina Milanesi, from Creative Strategies.
The analyst added, “Many observers believed that many companies would not return after the
health crisis, but small companies that do not have the necessary strength to organize their own activities are participating in the exhibition and generating movement” in it.
The role of algorithms in electronics is growing, from industrial equipment to vacuum cleaners, but the emergence of generative artificial intelligence heralds further transformations in devices used in everyday life.
Adam Borden, an official at Accenture, explained that until today, artificial intelligence has allowed data to be processed on a large scale “in a fairly consistent way.”
However, generative artificial intelligence programs, which became available to the public last year thanks to “ChatGPT,” have gone beyond this limited use to a broader scope, as they are capable of producing texts, images, or sounds based on a simple request, through machines that derive knowledge. From mountains of
information and data, on servers, perhaps in real time.
Adam Borden predicted that “personal assistance programs based on artificial intelligence and integrated into vehicles and robots will become available, with the ability to sense what is happening around them, including emotions, and adapt their answers to that data (…) They will also be able to provide advice as well as implement… Tasks on behalf of their owners,” such as reserving a table in a restaurant.
– “An extension of man”
Borden relied in particular on artificial intelligence to improve traffic safety. He saw that this
technology was in some cases similar to “an extension of the human body and mind,” and stated that “artificial intelligence will be able to measure the driver’s degree of alertness based on his facial expressions, the attentiveness of his gaze, and so on.” .
The exhibition devoted a large space to self-driving personal, industrial and agricultural vehicles, motorcycles, smart boats and computer programs that have become essential in all means of transportation.
Health and beauty also have a special place in the exhibition. The companies will also highlight the environmental progress they have made, from recyclable packaging to products that use less electricity.
Fans of high-performance screens and home appliances will be able to learn about the latest developments in the field of televisions and other home equipment.
2024-01-05 20:32:55
#Artificial #intelligence #dominates #Las #Vegas #Electronics #Show

author: NewsBreak Original
title: The warmest December in Giles County history
text: The popular image of an idyllic December is one of white Christmases, hot chocolate retreats, snow-capped conifers, and cozy, cold-weather activities. But not every December lives up to those expectations. Most of the continental U.S. will experience its peak winter cold weather in January and February . Officially, winter doesn't even start until Dec. 21. Across the U.S., the average December temperature from 1901-2000 was right above freezing point, at 32.68 F. Yearly temperatures can be compared to this 20th-century long-term average to find how uncommon a year's December climate was. The nation's warmest December on record was 2021, when the average temperature reached 6.66 F above the long-term average, at 39.34 F. December 2022 was closer to the previous century's average for the U.S. overall, at 33.08 F. The average temperature in Giles County, Virginia from 1901-2000 was 33.7. The diverse climates of the U.S. mean residents can experience a range of holiday weather without breaking out their passports. Within the continental U.S., Monroe County, Florida, at the Southeast tip of the state, reported the highest average December temperature during the past century at 67.6 F. On the other end of the spectrum was Roseau County, Minnesota, bordering Canada, at 7.2 F. However, across both sides of the extremes, temperatures are warming. While that doesn't mean every December will be warmer than the last or the prior century's average, it does mean long-term temperature averages will continue to inch up the thermometer. When did Giles County, Virginia experience its warmest December? To find out, Stacker used data from the National Centers for Environmental Information to identify the 15 Decembers with the highest average temperature since 1895. Also included is how that year's temperature compared to the 1901-2000 average. Read on to see if you lived through the warmest December in Giles County, Virginia history.

author: DARREN SANDS
title: Black pastors see popular Easter services as an opportunity to rebuild in-person worship attendance
text:
WASHINGTON — At the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic, when many churches moved their services online, the Rev. William H. Lamar IV initially shuddered at the thought that he needed to morph into a "video personality" to stay engaged with his parishioners.
"I resisted kicking and screaming because I'm a child of the '70s," said Lamar, the senior pastor of historic Metropolitan African Methodist Episcopal Church in Washington, D.C. "I'm not a digital native."
Four years later, Lamar, a talented preacher, has adjusted to offering both virtual and in-person services. After a noticeable attendance drop, more Metropolitan congregants are choosing in-person worship over virtual, even as they mourn members who died from COVID-19.
This Easter, Lamar is grateful to be back in person with his flock, believing it's a fitting way to celebrate the holiday's message of hope and resurrection.
This Easter is also an opportunity for Black churches to welcome more visitors to their pews and try to begin reversing attendance trends. More than a dozen Black clergy said their churches are still feeling the pandemic's impact on already-waning attendance, even as they have rolled out robust online options to reach new people.
Black Protestants' monthly church attendance declined 15% from 2019 to 2023, a larger drop than any other major religious group, according to a 2023 Pew Research study. They are also more likely than other groups to take in religious services online or on TV, with more than half (54%) saying they attend services virtually.
This dynamic is being felt at Calvary Baptist Church in the New York City borough of Queens. Its senior pastor, the Rev. Victor T. Hall Sr., hopes this Easter, if for only one Sunday, he'll get a glimpse of the way things used to be, when his church was "packed and rocking."
Before the pandemic, Calvary's numbers were already dwindling as many members moved to more affordable locales in states such as Maryland, North Carolina and Georgia, forcing Hall to offer one service on Sunday morning instead of two.
"The churches were already declining, but COVID was the coup de grace," Hall said. "And don't let nobody fool you. It's hard looking at empty pews."
Easter is typically a homecoming of sorts for Black Protestants, who traditionally wear new outfits accented with pastels and elaborate hats – a sartorial expression of the Christian celebration, and an ode to springtime renewal.
But some of the vibrancy and pageantry of Black church culture was extinguished with the inability to gather, said KB Dennis Meade, an assistant professor of religious studies at Northwestern University who is curating a digital archive of how Black religious traditions adapted during the pandemic. She said Easter and other major holidays are an opportunity to further assess that, including comparing this year's attendance numbers to pre-pandemic Easter Sunday numbers.
"If you're a cultural Christian, but maybe not a practicing one, you're going to want to go to church on Easter," she said.
The Rev. Kia Conerway founded The Church at the Well in Memphis, Tennessee, in 2018. The congregation had just moved into their new building space when COVID-19 hit.
Through innovative marketing and online worship, the church kept growing, from 160 members in 2019 to well over 400 today, according to Conerway. Now, every other Sunday is a completely virtual service, and more than a third of the congregation tunes in from outside the local area.
"Easter is the Super Bowl of Christianity," she said. "When we realized that 37% of our people did not live in Memphis, we were challenged to figure out how we serve them now that we're back in the building."
To better serve virtual worshippers, the church redoubled efforts to draw them into small groups and initiated a monthly check-in call.
Ahead of Easter, church members assembled and sent care packages to those who attend virtually. They included gift cards to pass out to strangers, safety glasses for the upcoming solar eclipse and handwritten notes, thanking them for being part of their church family and looking forward to seeing them again soon.
For those celebrating Easter in person, the church will serve snow cones and the children will participate in an Easter egg hunt. "We want kids to feel at home and to feel connected," Conerway said.
During the pandemic at Saints Memorial Community Church in Willingboro, New Jersey, the Rev. Cassius L. Rudolph scrambled to ensure his elderly members would be able to meet. The first Sunday that the church doors were closed, Rudolph, who began as the interim pastor in 2019, led the service via telephone.
The cacophony of voices on the conference call "was just unbearable, but they wanted to be able to interact with each other," he said.
This Easter, members of Saints Memorial are looking forward to being together in their renovated church sanctuary, complete with a new roof.
"They want to be back home on Easter," Rudolph said.
At Chicago's Trinity United Church of Christ, the Rev. Otis Moss III said there is collective gratitude that the church can gather safely in person this Easter Sunday. But there is also grief over the lives Trinity lost to COVID-19 and the human suffering in places like Haiti, Darfur, Congo and Gaza.
This confluence of events inspired his Easter message, entitled "It's Still Dark," which examines the space between Friday's crucifixion of Christ and Sunday's resurrection.
"We are as a nation and as a community sitting between these two moments," Moss said.
"We can never remove our spiritual strivings from our existential dilemma, nor can we remove what is happening in the world from our spiritual and theological frame," Moss said. "Those two things go together. Right now, people who are marginalized are hurting. There should be a voice from the faith community that speaks to those who are weeping."
On Palm Sunday at Metropolitan AME, the week before Easter, Lamar asked his flock to consider the mindset of Jesus as he marched into Jerusalem where he would be crucified.
"Was Jesus joyful? Was he pensive? Was he afraid?" he asked.
Behind a lectern flanked by kente cloth, Lamar looked out to a promising sign – people filled more than two-thirds of the cavernous sanctuary.
His parishioners hummed, shouted, stood and applauded as his preaching reached a crescendo.
During this sacred season, it was a welcome reminder of the power of Black preaching, especially when experienced live and in person.
He left the pulpit near the end of the service to deliver the benediction, an unusual move for the pastor. But it gave him the opportunity to give a more personal goodbye to the influx of Palm Sunday worshippers — both old and new

author: iheart.com
title: Death of 8-month old boy in Roosevelt Park under investigation | Newsradio WOOD 1300 and 106.9 FM | WOOD Radio Local News
text:
Police are looking into the death of an 8-month-old boy suspected to be due to co-sleeping.
While an autopsy is being awaited on to confirm the cause of death, Roosevelt Park Police Department Chief Shawn Bride said that “initial information suggests co-sleeping may have played a contributing role.”
For the developing story, head on over to WOOD-TV.

author: Pedro Henrique Cardoso
title: UFLA avança na criação de uma Política Institucional de Saúde Mental
text:
UFLA avança na criação de uma Política Institucional de Saúde Mental
Em audiência pública realizada no dia 30 de outubro no Departamento de Administração e Economia (DAP) da Universidade Federal de Lavras (UFLA), a comunidade acadêmica teve a oportunidade de conhecer a proposta e discutir a criação de uma Política Institucional de Saúde Mental. A iniciativa, liderada pela Pró-Reitoria de Apoio à Permanência Estudantil (Prape), busca promover um ambiente mais saudável e inclusivo para todos os membros da Universidade.
A proposta vem sendo elaborada desde agosto deste ano por uma comissão composta por docentes, técnicos administrativos, estudantes, funcionários terceirizados e representantes do Núcleo de Saúde Mental. O [documento atual](/images/noticias/2024/11_NOV/Política_de_Saúde_Mental.pdf) prevê a implementação de diferentes ações e diretrizes, entre elas, um programa de combate ao suicídio, a disponibilização de serviços gratuitos de saúde mental, o suporte a grupos de apoio, o incentivo à prática de hábitos saudáveis no câmpus e a criação de espaços de lazer. Todas essas diretrizes procuram estar alinhadas à Política Nacional de Saúde Mental.
Segundo o pró-reitor de Apoio à Permanência Estudantil, Rossano Wagner de Lima Botelho, essa audiência pública é apenas o início de um processo. “Disponibilizamos o documento-base da proposta que já produzimos. Daremos um prazo para as pessoas realizarem sugestões e apresentem novas ideias. Depois de feitos os ajustes com base nesses apontamentos, elaboraremos uma instrução que instituirá uma Política Institucional de Saúde Mental para a UFLA”.
Participação da comunidade
Um formulário eletrônico, que pode ser acessado neste link, foi criado para o envio de sugestões. Ele ficará disponível até o dia 21/11. Por meio dele, é possível demonstrar concordância ou discordância com a proposta inicial, realizar sugestões, comentários ou críticas, e opinar sobre a composição e o papel da Comissão Permanente.
A coordenadora de Saúde da Prape, Thaís Emmanuelle Mesquita Hermes Faria, destacou a importância da participação da comunidade universitária na construção dessa política. "Essa contribuição não só fundamenta estratégias, conferindo um caráter inclusivo, mas também aprimora a efetividade da política, cujo foco é criar um ambiente de apoio e bem-estar que promova o desenvolvimento pessoal, amplie a qualidade de vida e fortaleça os cuidados e as ações de assistência já existentes”.
Próximos passos
Após a análise das contribuições, a comissão elaborará uma instrução que instituirá a Política Institucional de Saúde Mental da UFLA. A criação dessa política representará um avanço significativo na promoção do bem-estar de toda a comunidade acadêmica.

author: archyde
title: Mikel Arteta’s Critique of VAR and Arsenal’s Performance: A Tough Evening at Etihad
text:
2023-12-28 23:06:26
Clearly, Mikel Arteta is never happy with refereeing, especially video. After a big rant against VAR during his team’s defeat at Newcastle in early November (1-0), the Spanish coach once again took the liberty of criticizing the decision of the officials aided by technology, due to of a ball released – or not – from Jarrod Bowen, decisive passer on the first goal of the Hammers, winners this Thursday evening on the lawn of the Etihad (2-0): “it’s like that. The technology we currently have is not clear enough to determine if the ball is out.”
The rest after this ad
The Gunners technician nevertheless wanted to have a word on his team’s performance, believing that the final result did not reflect the dynamics of the meeting: “we want to be at the top and today we are very, very disappointed. We dominated the match so much. We are in a very good position. Today is a disappointing evening. We need to get our act together for the big game against Fulham. We dominated for 100 minutes. When we had important situations, we had players inside the box completely free. I think the players made a huge effort. The locker room is tough right now, but we have another game in 72 hours. It’s football, we have to improve in certain areas.”
Pub. 12/29/2023 00:06 Updated 12/29/2023 02:00
1703813712
#Mikel #Arteta #puts #spin #VAR

author: sina_mobile
title: 坚持产业金融发展道路 建设一流产业券商_手机新浪网
text:
坚持产业金融发展道路 建设一流产业券商
● 本报记者 齐金钊
中央金融工作会议明确提出“做好科技金融、绿色金融、普惠金融、养老金融、数字金融五篇大文章”，为证券行业服务实体经济、推动高质量发展指明了方向。长城证券;)积极响应国家战略，深入践行金融报国、金融为民的初心使命，提升金融服务实体经济质效，结合自身优势，在产融结合中探索差异化路径，助力培育新质生产力，进一步走深走稳走好产融结合道路，建设特色化的一流产业证券公司;)。
服务主责主业 赋能产业创新
在长城证券看来，科技金融是推动实体经济向“硬科技”领域转型升级的核心引擎。“通过资本市场的直接融资功能，我们为科技企业提供全生命周期服务，推动技术研发与产业化落地。”长城证券相关负责人介绍，近年来，长城证券坚持“从金融中来，到产业中去”，持续深化科创金融港建设，打造以主业为核心的产业需求对接平台，通过产业赋能和金融助力，有效促进“科技-产业-金融”良性循环，为科技创新与产业升级提供金融支持。
怀着助力科创企业、赋能产业创新的初心，长城证券在科技金融领域硕果累累。2024年7月，长城证券作为主承销商，助力中电投融和融资租赁有限公司成功发行15亿元“数字经济”科技创新公司债券，为我国科技自立自强输送“源头活水”。
绿色金融是实现“双碳”目标的关键抓手。近年来，长城证券发挥自身特色助力华能新能源再融资、碳中和绿色债发行等。2024年12月，长城证券收到中国证监会关于参与碳排放权交易相关批复，公司自营业务正式获准参与碳排放权交易，积极开展绿色金融实践。
在做好科技金融与绿色金融的同时，长城证券在普惠金融领域也躬身实践。长城证券相关负责人表示，长城证券践行“以客户为中心”的理念，将普惠金融作为公司履行社会责任的重要内容，通过精细化运营和金融科技赋能，服务居民财富管理，构建大财富管理生态圈。一是全力打造财富智慧平台，为客户提供个性化、精细化、高匹配的精准服务。二是着力发展“炼金锦囊”和“超级网格”等特色业务，多元化服务居民财富管理需求。三是持续丰富固收类、ETF套利类产品货架，致力打造客户放心、员工安心、产品安全的“财富长城”管理业务品牌。
坚守金融为民 提升服务水平
长城证券认为，养老金融是促进金融市场长期稳定发展、保障和改善民生的“稳定器”。对此，长城证券积极响应深圳市证券业协会《关于提升深圳辖区证券公司互联网应用程序服务水平，切实解决老年人及特殊群体投资者运用智能技术困难的倡议书》号召，研发并推出长城炼金术APP长辈版模式，上线“视觉无障碍”和语音助手功能，进一步提升老年人及特殊群体投资者使用体验，不断提升服务水平。
同时，长城证券还针对性推出陪伴式投资者教育服务，通过开展“走进社区”等品牌投教活动，定期举办养老金融讲座，普及养老理财知识，引导投资者树立正确的养老投资理念。
数字化转型是证券行业高质量发展的必由之路。长城证券自主研发“战略管理数字化平台”，采用人工智能、大数据与云原生等先进技术，提供了科学完整的战略管理方法论，入选2024年度上市公司数字化转型最佳实践案例。长城证券自研“智源AI中心”获中国人民银行金融科技发展奖三等奖，同时持续推进“A计划”，打造“客户流失分析预测”等系列AI助手强化业务管理；建设IDC机房，成功立项新一代核心交易系统；研发长城智慧平台，打造“业财数据一体化”助力智慧经营决策管理。截至2024年底，长城证券获得科技发明专利数量已进入行业前十。
面向未来，长城证券表示，作为央企控股上市券商，公司将牢牢把握金融工作的政治性、人民性，持续深化金融“五篇大文章”的实践内涵，通过科技赋能产业升级、绿色引领低碳转型、普惠促进社会公平、养老服务民生福祉、数字重塑金融生态，坚守金融初心，服务实体经济，以高质量发展的实际成效为服务中国式现代化、助力金融强国建设作出贡献。
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business strategy and marketing

author: Redacción Mundo
title: Ya hay soldados norcoreanos combatiendo en nombre de Rusia, según Ucrania | EL ESPECTADOR
text: Ucrania aseguró el jueves 24 de octubre que Rusia desplegó soldados norcoreanos en la región rusa de Kursk, parcialmente controlada por fuerzas ucranianas, incrementando los temores de las potencias occidentales de una escalada mayor en la guerra. “Las primeras unidades del ejército norcoreano, entrenadas en el este de Rusia, ya llegaron a la zona de combate”, indicó la inteligencia militar ucraniana (GUR) en un comunicado. “El 23 de octubre de 2024 se registró su aparición en la región de Kursk”, agregó. El presidente de Rusia, Vladimir Putin, no desmintió el despliegue de tropas norcoreanas en su país, solo aseguró que cualquier movimiento “es asunto nuestro”. “Rusia nunca dudó de que la RPDC (República Popular Democrática de Corea) se toma en serio la cooperación rusa, estamos cooperando con nuestros amigos norcoreanos”, declaró Putin en una conferencia de prensa durante la cumbre de los Brics. Según dijeron fuentes militares a la agencia de noticias japonesa Kyodo, es cierto que unos 2.000 soldados norcoreanos desplegados en Rusia se desplazan hacia el oeste del país, cerca de la frontera con Ucrania. Las tropas norcoreanas habrían concluido su entrenamiento en territorio ruso y estarían siendo ahora trasladadas al frente en Ucrania para dar apoyo a Moscú en su ofensiva, según detalló dicha fuente. El Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia (NIS) surcoreano estima que Pionyang ha enviado ya unos 3.000 soldados a territorio ruso, de los 10.000 que podrían ser desplegados en Ucrania para diciembre. Esas afirmaciones se dan cuando los diputados rusos ratificaron poco antes un tratado de defensa con Corea del Norte por unanimidad, con 397 votos, que prevé una asistencia mutua en caso de agresión armada de la parte de un tercer país. Por su lado, Corea del Norte niega suministrar fuerzas frescas para su ataque contra Ucrania, y un representante de Pyongyang en la ONU habló de “rumor sin fundamento”. Ayer, 23 de octubre, Estados Unidos aseguró que disponía de pruebas del envío de soldados de ese país asiático para su posible uso en Ucrania. Una movida que refleja que el presidente ruso, Vladimir Putin, está “desesperado” y no ha conseguido sus objetivos bélicos en Ucrania, consideró el Pentágono. “Putin se ha vuelto tan desesperado que ahora solicita potencialmente apoyo de Corea del Norte para poner a su personal en el campo de batalla”, dijo en una conferencia de prensa la subportavoz del Pentágono, Sabrina Singh. “¿Qué están haciendo exactamente?”, dijo el secretario de Defensa de Estados Unidos, Lloyd J. Austin III, a los periodistas en días pasados. “Está por verse”, agregó. Estas declaraciones se producen mientras funcionarios de inteligencia estadounidenses han anunciado que se preparan para publicar una gran cantidad de información, incluidas fotografías satelitales, que muestran barcos de tropas moviéndose desde Corea del Norte a áreas de entrenamiento en Vladivostok, en la costa este de Rusia, y otros territorios rusos más al norte, informó The New York Times. Putin admitió el día del cierre de la cumbre de los BRICS, grupo de nueve países a veces presentados como los del “Sur global”, que todos los países del grupo, en particular China y Brasil, quieren que la guerra en Ucrania acabe cuanto antes y, preferiblemente, por la vía pacífica. Sin embargo, afirmó que un eventual acuerdo de paz con Ucrania, donde el ejército ruso controla un 20% del territorio, debería basarse “en las realidades” del campo de batalla. “Estamos dispuestos a considerar cualquier negociación de paz basada en las realidades en el terreno. No estamos dispuestos a aceptar nada más”, declaró Putin en una rueda de prensa al final de la cumbre. El mandatario ruso calificó de “ilusoria” la perspectiva de una derrota de su país en Ucrania, antes de su primera reunión con el secretario general de la ONU, Antonio Guterres, en más de dos años. Los adversarios de Rusia “no ocultan su objetivo de asestarle a nuestro país una derrota estratégica”, declaró Putin durante la cumbre de los BRICS en la ciudad rusa de Kazán. “Diré directamente que son cálculos ilusorios que solo pueden ser hechos por quienes no conocen la historia rusa”, agregó. 📧 📬 🌍 Semana a semana tendremos un resumen de las noticias que nos harán sentir que No es el fin del mundo. Si desea inscribirse y recibir todos los lunes nuestro newsletter, puede hacerlo en el siguiente enlace. 👀🌎📄 ¿Ya se enteró de las últimas noticias en el mundo? Invitamos a verlas en El Espectador. Si le interesa algún tema internacional, quiere enviarnos una opinión sobre nuestro contenido o recibir más información, escríbanos al correo mmedina@elespectador.com o aosorio@elespectador.com
